# Finland, Norway, Sweden, Russia Latitude and Longitude + video

```{r, echo=FALSE}
country <- c("Finland", "Norway", "Sweden", "Rusia")
lat <- c(61.9241, 64.5783089, 64.964875, 55.0)
lon <- c(25.7482, 17.888237, 17.675409, 103.0)
video <- c('<iframe width="560" height="315" 
src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TcXXJis03SE" title="YouTube video player" 
frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; 
encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>','<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cntxv3w_xyE" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; 
            encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>', '<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YiXCg0lzIww" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; 
            encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>', '<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y4cXIyyc-L0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; 
encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>')

```

# Finland Dataframe

```{r}
Finland <- data.frame(country, lat, lon, video)
```


# Map of Finland, Norway, Sweden and Russia

```{r, echo=FALSE}
n <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(data = Finland, lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, popup = ~paste(country, video))
n
```
